jobDescription: About the CompanyOur client, a successful and respected asset manager, has asked us to help them identify a Data Analyst for a full time role in their Boston location. The candidate must have experience working in the asset management space. Job Description: In this role the Data Analyst/Engineer will be creating and enhancing database models for transactional databases and data warehouses. They will be building ETL operational repositories and data warehouses and will be doing optimization for performance enhancement. This is a data centric role where they will be working directly with the business users, business analysts, database administrators and other developers to product clean and concise code. Qualifications: 5+ years of SQL Server database and administration experience 3+ years of experience with database modelling using data modelling tools5+ years of relevant work experience; asset management industry experience preferredExperience with master data management tools (Markit EDM, Informatica MDM) helpfulBachelor degree or higher in Computer or Information ScienceInterested and qualified candidates should send a Word version of their resume to Angela Fagin at afagin@daleyaa.com. This is a full time position and there will not be any sponsorship of visa transfers. Absolutely no C2C candidates will be considered.
